overview: A dark comedy about love, family and online dating. Cassie is bored with her home life. Her brother, Marc is bored at work. They both take to the internet to pass the time. What happens when they both take that dark road into online dating? Will Cassie discover a new found freedom? Will Marc find a new love after his divorce? What hidden secrets lie in wait for our two lost souls? Swipe right. Swipe left. Did you match?
tagline: A dark comedy about falling in and out of love
title: Hidden Secrets
